## ColorXYZ.toObject() method

Returns the [ColorXYZ](./fast-colors.colorxyz.md) formatted as an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toObject(): {
        x: number;
        y: number;
        z: number;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`{ x: number; y: number; z: number; }`
